target.text: To sign up for a zone:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Contact sales@sitescape.com to sign up for WebWorkZone.

target.name: Step
target.text: Contact sales@sitescape.com to sign up for WebWorkZone.

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter the URL in the browser window. The URL follows this format:

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter your username and password, then click Login. (You may want to bookmark the page so that you can access it quickly in the future.)
